mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO prm_emp_kpi_led ( group_id, hos_id, copy_code, sec_code, acc_year, acc_month, kpi_code, emp_id, emp_no, kpi_beg_score, kpi_end_score, goal_code
) VALUES ( #{group_id}, #{hos_id}, #{copy_code}, #{sec_code}, #{acc_year}, #{acc_month}, #{kpi_code}, #{emp_id}, #{emp_no}, #{kpi_beg_score}, #{kpi_end_score}, #{goal_code} )

update.foreach:
UPDATE prm_emp_kpi_led SET sec_code = #{item.sec_code} , kpi_beg_score = #{item.kpi_beg_score} , kpi_end_score = #{item.kpi_end_score}
WHERE group_id = #{item.group_id} and hos_id = #{item.hos_id} and copy_code = #{item.copy_code} and sec_code = #{item.sec_code} and acc_year = #{item.acc_year} and acc_month = #{item.acc_month} and kpi_code = #{item.kpi_code} and goal_code = #{item.goal_code} and emp_id = #{item.emp_id} and emp_no = #{item.emp_no}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM prm_emp_kpi_led WHERE group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and sec_code = #{sec_code} and acc_year = #{acc_year} and acc_month = #{acc_month} and kpi_code = #{kpi_code} and goal_code = #{goal_code} and emp_id = #{emp_id} and emp_no = #{emp_no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.sec_code, b.sec_name, a.acc_year, a.acc_month, a.kpi_code, a.goal_code, a.emp_id, a.emp_no, a.kpi_beg_score, a.kpi_end_score, b.led_path FROM prm_emp_kpi_led a left join prm_led b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.copy_code = b.copy_code and a.sec_code = b.sec_code WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code} and a.sec_code = #{sec_code} and a.acc_year = #{acc_year} and a.acc_month = #{acc_month} and a.kpi_code = #{kpi_code} and a.goal_code = #{goal_code} and a.emp_id = #{emp_id} and a.emp_no = #{emp_no}
